prisonescape.game.screens
Class ActiveGame

java.lang.Object
  prisonescape.game.screens.ActiveGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class ActiveGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

This class represents the current active game play which includes the map, HUD and pause menu

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam Ward, Shibu George, Sean Corcoran, Hamza Zaman
